item.title: Easy question, please look(and help)
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Not sure exactly, but it can be done. I checking now

Found it! Goto client.java and search for this:

public void initSmithing(int barType)

scroll down and you should see something like this:

if(playerLevel[13] < 1) { sendQuest("@bla@Dagger@bla@",1094); sendQuest("@bla@Axe@bla@",1091); } else { sendQuest("@whi@Dagger@whi@",1094); sendQuest("@whi@Axe@whi@",1091); } addItemToSmith(1205,0,1119,1); addItemToSmith(1351,0,1120,1);

the addItemToSmith has the itemID, and i guess you can change that. Idk what the sendQuests do though, idk if u have to change them. O and heres the layout for addItemToSmith:

public void addItemToSmith(int id, int slot, int column, int amount)

;D

Read full topic
